str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To make ready, prepare. From hetoimos; to prepare.
Lodging, hospitality. From xenos; hospitality, i.e. a place of entertainment.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To hope, hope for, expect, trust. From elpis; to expect or confide.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From proseuchomai; prayer; by implication, an oratory.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) To show favor to, (b) To pardon, forgive, (c) To show kindness.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
